---
title: "OOLEY International"
date: "2019-07-18"
---

\[vc\_row height="small" us\_bg\_image\_source="media" us\_bg\_image="6996" us\_bg\_parallax="vertical" us\_bg\_overlay\_color="rgba(43,43,43,0.42)" content\_placement="middle" gap="10px" columns\_type="boxes"\]\[vc\_column width="1/2" css="%7B%22default%22%3A%7B%22background-color%22%3A%22%23f9a02c%22%7D%7D"\]\[vc\_column\_text css="%7B%22default%22%3A%7B%22background-color%22%3A%22%23f9a02c%22%7D%7D"\]

### **OOLEY is a sociocultural project for** **creative capabilities** **development of a person and the society.**

\[/vc\_column\_text\]\[/vc\_column\]\[vc\_column width="1/2" css="%7B%22default%22%3A%7B%22background-color%22%3A%22%23f6f6f6%22%2C%22color%22%3A%22%230a0a0a%22%7D%7D"\]\[vc\_custom\_heading text="Our goal is" use\_theme\_fonts="yes" el\_class="lineatura"\]\[vc\_column\_text\]To make unleashed creativity easy, accessible and ubiquitous. \[/vc\_column\_text\]\[/vc\_column\]\[vc\_column css="%7B%22default%22%3A%7B%22background-color%22%3A%22rgba%28255%2C255%2C255%2C0.9%29%22%2C%22%2Abackground-color%22%3A%22rgb%28255%2C255%2C255%29%22%7D%7D"\]\[vc\_column\_text\]We research, establish and develop creative processes and spaces so as to shape an environment for people to improve, collaborate and self-realize.\[/vc\_column\_text\]\[/vc\_column\]\[/vc\_row\]\[vc\_row height="medium" us\_bg\_image\_source="media" us\_bg\_overlay\_color="rgba(96,96,96,0.42)" content\_placement="middle" gap="10px" columns\_type="boxes"\]\[vc\_column css="%7B%22default%22%3A%7B%22padding-top%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22padding-right%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22padding-bottom%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22padding-left%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22background-color%22%3A%22%23f9a02c%22%7D%7D"\]\[vc\_custom\_heading text="Our activities" font\_container="tag:h3|text\_align:center" use\_theme\_fonts="yes" el\_class="lineatura" css="%7B%22default%22%3A%7B%22margin-top%22%3A%220px%22%2C%22margin-right%22%3A%220px%22%2C%22margin-bottom%22%3A%220px%22%2C%22margin-left%22%3A%220px%22%7D%7D"\]\[/vc\_column\]\[vc\_column link="url:%23map|||" width="1/2" css="%7B%22default%22%3A%7B%22padding-top%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22padding-right%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22padding-bottom%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22padding-left%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22background-color%22%3A%22%23f6f6f6%22%7D%7D" offset="vc\_col-xs-12"\]\[vc\_custom\_heading text="Public workshops map" font\_container="tag:h4|text\_align:left" use\_theme\_fonts="yes" el\_class="lineatura"\]\[vc\_column\_text\]

We look for different public creative spaces and collect data about them in our joint catalog.

\[/vc\_column\_text\]\[/vc\_column\]\[vc\_column link="url:%23review|||" width="1/2" css="%7B%22default%22%3A%7B%22padding-top%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22padding-right%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22padding-bottom%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22padding-left%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22background-color%22%3A%22%23f6f6f6%22%7D%7D" offset="vc\_col-xs-12"\]\[vc\_custom\_heading text="Workshop reviews" font\_container="tag:h4|text\_align:left" use\_theme\_fonts="yes" el\_class="lineatura"\]\[vc\_column\_text\]

We explore russian and international experience in establishment and development of various public workshops and makerspaces.

\[/vc\_column\_text\]\[/vc\_column\]\[vc\_column link="url:%23practice|||" width="1/2" css="%7B%22default%22%3A%7B%22padding-top%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22padding-right%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22padding-bottom%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22padding-left%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22background-color%22%3A%22%23f6f6f6%22%7D%7D" offset="vc\_col-xs-12"\]\[vc\_custom\_heading text="Creative practice" font\_container="tag:h4|text\_align:left" use\_theme\_fonts="yes" el\_class="lineatura"\]\[vc\_column\_text\]We test our insights and ideas in the format of different events and social experiments.\[/vc\_column\_text\]\[/vc\_column\]\[vc\_column link="url:%23theory|||" width="1/2" css="%7B%22default%22%3A%7B%22padding-top%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22padding-right%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22padding-bottom%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22padding-left%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22background-color%22%3A%22%23f6f6f6%22%7D%7D" offset="vc\_col-xs-12"\]\[vc\_custom\_heading text="Theory development" font\_container="tag:h4|text\_align:left" use\_theme\_fonts="yes" el\_class="lineatura"\]\[vc\_column\_text\]We universalize all that accumulated experience in the general theory of sustainable open workshops.\[/vc\_column\_text\]\[/vc\_column\]\[/vc\_row\]\[vc\_row height="medium" us\_bg\_image\_source="media" # Practice

\[/vc\_column\_text\]\[/vc\_column\]\[/vc\_row\]\[vc\_row height="medium" us\_bg\_image\_source="media" us\_bg\_image="7146" us\_bg\_parallax="still" us\_bg\_overlay\_color="rgba(153,153,153,0.44)" content\_placement="middle" disable\_element="yes" fadeout\_row="fadeout\_row\_value" enable\_overlay="enable\_overlay\_value" overlay\_color="rgba(0,0,0,0.46)" el\_id="lomcamp" el\_class="compact-headers"\]\[vc\_column width="1/2" css="%7B%22default%22%3A%7B%22color%22%3A%22%23ffffff%22%7D%7D"\]\[us\_image image="7217" size="medium" align="center" onclick="custom\_link" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fwww.lom.camp||target:%20\_blank|" css="%7B%22default%22%3A%7B%22margin-bottom%22%3A%222em%22%7D%7D"\]\[vc\_column\_text css="%7B%22default%22%3A%7B%22margin-top%22%3A%220px%22%7D%7D"\]

### üóì 3 ‚Äî 18 –∞–≤–≥—É—Å—Ç–∞ 2019

### üß≠ –°—ë—Ä—Ñ–ª–∞–≥–µ—Ä—å, 80 –∫–º –æ—Ç –ù. –ù–æ–≤–≥–æ—Ä–æ–¥–∞

\[/vc\_column\_text\]\[/vc\_column\]\[vc\_column width="1/2" css="%7B%22default%22%3A%7B%22background-color%22%3A%22rgba%28255%2C255%2C255%2C0.82%29%22%2C%22%2Abackground-color%22%3A%22rgb%28255%2C255%2C255%29%22%7D%7D"\]\[vc\_column\_text\]

# –õ–û–ú: –õ–µ—Å–Ω—ã–µ –æ—Ç–∫—Ä—ã—Ç—ã–µ –º–∞—Å—Ç–µ—Ä—Å–∫–∏–µ

–ú—ã —Ä–∞–∑–≤–æ—Ä–∞—á–∏–≤–∞–µ–º —É–Ω–∏–≤–µ—Ä—Å–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–µ —Ç–≤–æ—Ä—á–µ—Å–∫–æ–µ –ø—Ä–æ—Å—Ç—Ä–∞–Ω—Å—Ç–≤–æ, –æ—Ö–≤–∞—Ç—ã–≤–∞—é—â–µ–µ –≤—Å–µ –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–Ω—ã–µ —Ä–µ–º–µ—Å–ª–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –Ω–∞–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è. –ú–∞—Å—Ç–µ—Ä–∞ –æ–±—É—á–∞—é—Ç –Ω–æ–≤–∏—á–∫–æ–≤ –∞–∑–∞–º —Å–≤–æ–µ–≥–æ –∏—Å–∫—É—Å—Å—Ç–≤–∞, –∞ –∫—É—Ä–∞—Ç–æ—Ä—ã –ø–æ–º–æ–≥–∞—é—Ç —É–º–µ–ª—å—Ü–∞–º —Ä–µ–∞–ª–∏–∑–æ–≤—ã–≤–∞—Ç—å –∏—Ö —Å–æ–±—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç—ã. –ò –≤—Å—ë —ç—Ç–æ –Ω–∞ —Å–≤–µ–∂–µ–º –≤–æ–∑–¥—É—Ö–µ, —Å –∑–∞—Ä—è–¥–∫–∞–º–∏, –π–æ–≥–æ–π, –≤–µ–≥–µ—Ç–∞—Ä–∏–∞–Ω—Å–∫–æ–π –∫—É—Ö–Ω–µ–π –∏ –ø—Ä–æ—Å—Ç–æ—Ä–æ–º –¥–ª—è –ø–æ–ª–µ—Ç–æ–≤ —Ñ–∞–Ω—Ç–∞–∑–∏–∏.\[/vc\_column\_text\]\[us\_hwrapper alignment="center" valign="middle" wrap="1"\]\[us\_btn label="Lom.camp" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Flom.camp||target:%20\_blank|" align="center"\]\[vc\_custom\_heading text="Mobile workshop OOLEY42" font\_container="tag:h2|text\_align:center" use\_theme\_fonts="yes" el\_class="lineatura"\]\[/vc\_column\]\[vc\_column width="1/2"\]\[vc\_column\_text\][**OOLEY42**](http://ooley.ru/ooley42/) ‚Äì is a small mobile universal workshop that fits into a camper and can be unfolded at any suitable location. It is our experimental facility for practical research of collective creativity and exploration of effective approaches to productive collaboration. You can invite us to make a lecture, a workshop or a any other kind of public creative events or design and architecture projects.\[/vc\_column\_text\]\[/vc\_column\]\[/vc\_row\]\[vc\_row height="small" us\_bg\_overlay\_color="#f9a02c" content\_placement="middle" el\_id="theory"\]\[vc\_column\]\[vc\_column\_text\]

# Theory

\[/vc\_column\_text\]\[/vc\_column\]\[/vc\_row\]\[vc\_row height="large" us\_bg\_image\_source="media" us\_bg\_image="5380" us\_bg\_parallax="still" us\_bg\_repeat="no-repeat" us\_bg\_overlay\_color="rgba(229,229,229,0.7)" content\_placement="bottom" gap="17.5px"\]\[vc\_column\]\[vc\_column\_text\]

## Creativity is an intentional enhancement of the reality.

\[/vc\_column\_text\]\[/vc\_column\]\[/vc\_row\]\[vc\_row height="medium" color\_scheme="alternate" us\_bg\_image\_source="media" us\_bg\_parallax="vertical" content\_placement="middle" gap="10px" columns\_type="boxes"\]\[vc\_column css="%7B%22default%22%3A%7B%22padding-top%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22padding-right%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22padding-bottom%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22padding-left%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22background-color%22%3A%22%2351b27b%22%7D%7D"\]\[vc\_column\_text\]

## Public workshop is a space for, capabilities and the process of creative collaboration.

\[/vc\_column\_text\]\[/vc\_column\]\[vc\_column link="|||" width="1/2" css="%7B%22default%22%3A%7B%22padding-top%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22padding-right%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22padding-bottom%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22padding-left%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22background-color%22%3A%22%23dddddd%22%7D%7D" offset="vc\_col-xs-12"\]\[vc\_custom\_heading text="Public space" font\_container="tag:h4|text\_align:left" use\_theme\_fonts="yes" el\_class="lineatura"\]\[vc\_column\_text\]for all sorts of making by guests and residents.\[/vc\_column\_text\]\[/vc\_column\]\[vc\_column link="|||" width="1/2" css="%7B%22default%22%3A%7B%22padding-top%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22padding-right%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22padding-bottom%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22padding-left%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22background-color%22%3A%22%23eaeaea%22%7D%7D" offset="vc\_col-xs-12"\]\[vc\_custom\_heading text="Capabilities" font\_container="tag:h4|text\_align:left" use\_theme\_fonts="yes" el\_class="lineatura"\]\[vc\_column\_text\]

provided with various equipment and proper materials supply.

\[/vc\_column\_text\]\[/vc\_column\]\[vc\_column link="|||" width="1/2" css="%7B%22default%22%3A%7B%22padding-top%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22padding-right%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22padding-bottom%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22padding-left%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22background-color%22%3A%22%23f2f2f2%22%7D%7D" offset="vc\_col-xs-12"\]\[vc\_custom\_heading text="Free exchange" font\_container="tag:h4|text\_align:left" use\_theme\_fonts="yes" el\_class="lineatura"\]\[vc\_column\_text\]

of tip and tricks, of skills and products, that are aquired during learning, researching, experimenting and working on different projects.

\[/vc\_column\_text\]\[/vc\_column\]\[vc\_column link="|||" width="1/2" css="%7B%22default%22%3A%7B%22padding-top%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22padding-right%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22padding-bottom%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22padding-left%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22background-color%22%3A%22%23f9f9f9%22%7D%7D" offset="vc\_col-xs-12"\]\[vc\_custom\_heading text="Active social climate" font\_container="tag:h4|text\_align:left" use\_theme\_fonts="yes" el\_class="lineatura"\]\[vc\_column\_text\]of creative collaboration with transparent principles of all process participants collaboration.\[/vc\_column\_text\]\[/vc\_column\]\[vc\_column css="%7B%22default%22%3A%7B%22padding-top%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22padding-right%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22padding-bottom%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22padding-left%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22background-color%22%3A%22%23e5e5e5%22%7D%7D"\]\[vc\_custom\_heading text="Stable attention" font\_container="tag:h4|text\_align:left" use\_theme\_fonts="yes" el\_class="lineatura"\]\[vc\_column\_text\]of paricipants to their projects and also their commitment to collaborate on shared endeavours.\[/vc\_column\_text\]\[/vc\_column\]\[/vc\_row\]\[vc\_row height="large" width="full" color\_scheme="alternate" us\_bg\_overlay\_color="#adadad" content\_placement="middle" columns\_type="boxes" css="%7B%22default%22%3A%7B%22padding-right%22%3A%2236px%22%2C%22padding-left%22%3A%2236px%22%7D%7D"\]\[vc\_column use\_theme\_fonts="yes" el\_class="lineatura" css="%7B%22default%22%3A%7B%22margin-bottom%22%3A%2242px%22%7D%7D"\]\[us\_carousel taxonomy\_category="international,theory" items\_quantity="" # Contacts
